short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that calculates your BMI, weight to lose, calories to eat, and how long it will take you to get lean.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simply enter your weight, height, and waist size: The Kino Calculator will estimate your BMI, amount of body fat you need to lose, how many calories per day to lose that body fat, how much protein to eat each day, and how quickly you should be able to lose that weight.
